about.mision: To preserve the health and confidence of our patients, with a more humane treatment, and much delicacy through the best comprehensive personalized and strict jmd treatments, based on medical evidence and our clinical research, but also adapting the medical care and clinical research to each patient. Getting involved in the knowledge of Psycho Immuno Metabolic diseases, focusing on and including their families, society itself, because there are no diseases, there are sick people, each one is special for us.
about.vision: o be one of the best pillars of health in Psycho Immuno Metabolic diseases, achieving the greatest number of cures for them, spreading the cure, promoting their knowledge and prevention, especially at the school level, increasing their medical and clinical research, for this it is necessary to establish links with more doctors and organizations that are interested in these diseases. To be the leading health organization in the transformation of the care of these diseases through healing, prevention and continuous research, being an important support for patients and the medical community.
about.valores: Humility, honesty, ethical principles, attitude of service, warmth, quality continuous improvement through research based on medical and clinical evidence but above all in living with the patient and their family. First the patient, then the patient and always the patient and behind the doctor and his family.
about.mensaje: At CL-JMD Offices, you will be able to find a better medical aproach, professional and high level of care not only in Diabetes and Hypertesion, but also in Psychoimmunometabolic Diseases. Our values with the client are:

diabetes.mensaje: The patient who knows the most and applies what he knows, is the patient who lives the longest and best.
diabetes.parrafo1: Diabetes is a chronic disease characterized by high levels of blood sugar, also called glucose, and a deficiency of insulin. Insulin is a hormone that the pancreas produces to help glucose enter the cells and be used as insulin energy.
diabetes.parrafo2: Diabetes can affect the heart, eyes, kidneys, and nervous system. Its complications include:
elementos: Neuropathy, which is damage to the nerves in the extremities
diabetes.parrafo3: There are three main types of diabetes:
elementosD: Type 1 diabetes It usually appears in youth and affects the pancreas, producing little or no insulin.
Type 2 diabetes It is the most common type and occurs when the body is unable to produce insulin.
Gestational diabetes It occurs during pregnancy and usually occurs at an advanced stage of pregnancy.

hipertension.mensaje: Acquire good eating habits, exercise and you will control your blood pressure.
hipertension.parrafo1: High blood pressure, also known as arterial hypertension, is a disease that occurs when the blood pressure in the arteries is too high.
hipertension.parrafo2: Hypertension is a cardiovascular risk factor that can cause serious diseases such as heart attack, stroke or kidney failure.
hipertension.parrafo4: To diagnose hypertension, blood pressure must be measured on two different days.

nutricion.mensaje: To lose weight you don't just need to diet and play sports, you must follow the rules to burn calories, this is what will allow you to achieve your goal.
nutricion.parrafo1: Nutrition is the process of consuming and using food and nutrients for the body to function. It is a topic that is related to health and is important throughout life.
nutricion.parrafo2: Nutrition includes: Obtaining food, Digesting food, Assimilation of nutrients, Transporting nutrients to the bloodstream, Using nutrients in the body.
nutricion.parrafo3: To have good nutrition, it is important to consume foods and drinks that contain the necessary nutrients. These nutrients are proteins, carbohydrates, fats, vitamins, minerals and water.
elementos: Reduce the risk of diseases such as type 2 diabetes, obesity and heart disease
Have energy for the functioning of the body
